Detailed Description

Main window for the sound browser application. It provides a menu for calling different operations on the sounds stored like renaming, deleting, or loading.

BOOLEAN SoundBrowserWin::SetSoundFilter (  const SoundFilter &  snd_filter,
BOOLEAN  show_select_button
) 
 

Sets the SoundFilter and reloads the entries of the SoundRefContainer by applying the sound filter to every sound.

Parameters:
snd_filter SoundFilter to apply.
show_select_button Defines if the select_button should be shown after the snd_filter has been applied to the entries.
